ai-kv7.6:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv7.6:1.5_0: They give almsfood to other dwellings, and medicines from here and there. They give others a meal of medicines and supplies for the sick. And they give drinking water for the sick.

ai-kv7.6:1.7_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv7.6:8.3_0: Well then, take the gift that has been given here.
ai-kv7.6:9.5_0: “Mendicants, parents see five reasons to wish for the birth of a child in the family.
ai-kv7.6:9.7_0: They’ll make sure that family will be doing for a long time. And if it will be for the family will be for the right time, they will die.
ai-kv7.6:9.8_0: Parents see these five reasons to wish for the birth of a child in the family.
ai-kv7.6:10.2_0: astute people wish for a child.
ai-kv7.6:10.3_0: Since we looked after them, they’ll look after us.
ai-kv7.6:10.4_0: They’ll do their duty for us.
ai-kv7.6:11.2_0: They’ll take care of the inheritance.
ai-kv7.6:11.3_0: Or else when we have passed away
ai-kv7.6:11.4_0: they’ll give an offering on our behalf.

ai-kv7.6:14.1_0: Following their advice, looking after those who raised them,
ai-kv7.6:14.2_0: the family traditions are not lost.
ai-kv7.6:14.3_0: One who is faithful, accomplished in ethics,
ai-kv7.6:15.3_0: Well then, take the gift that has been given here.
